Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Do you think the little one could be <clr:0000>the
bigger leviathan's child<clr:ffff>? I mean, it's hard
to tell from just the skull, but...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_01>Just imagine the fossils of the <clr:0000>parent and
child leviathans, side by side<clr:ffff>!

Could the child fossil's <clr:0000>body and tail <clr:ffff>still
be somewhere nearby? I sure hope so!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aha! I just knew the body and tail would
be around here somewhere!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I bet if you <clr:0000>connected them to the skull<clr:ffff>,
the fossil would look a lot more like its
baby leviathan self!<sp:0:4:0>Oh, just imagine how cute they'd be...<sp:5:1:0> The
parent and child leviathans, side by side!
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe you're not as big of a fossil fan
as I thought... Too bad.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Ahhh!<sp:5:1:0> I knew it! The fossil WAS a baby
leviathan after all! Just look at them! You
can totally see the family resemblance!
Oh, I can just picture the two of them
swimming through the ancient oceans...
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've traveled so far, I just can't go home
without seeing them together and intact!
I'll pay any price!
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>You put the baby leviathan fossil back
together for me, didn't you?<sp:0:4:0>It's so darling, I can hardly stand it! Here!
Take this reward before I lose my mind!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Ah, I knew I'd find you here! I think you
might love fossils even more than I do.
Talk13: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Oh, what are you doing over there?
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>My...my life is complete.<sp:5:1:0> Visiting the
Eldin, <sp:5:0:0>Hebra,<sp:5:0:0> and Gerudo regions...
Meeting all my cute little leviathans...
And this parent and child combo may be
the cutest of all!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>I just want to stay with this adorable
leviathan fossil family forever!
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>They look pretty similar to me.<sp:5:1:0>
Extremely similar, in fact!
Talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>So, hey, take a look at this fossil.<sp:5:1:0>
Doesn't it kind of look like a <clr:0000>child<clr:ffff>?
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_01>Just imagine it! <sp:5:1:0>The fossils of the <clr:0000>parent
and child leviathans, side by side<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>I wonder if the child fossil's <clr:0000>body and tail<clr:ffff>
are still somewhere nearby...
Talk02: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny_01>Yeah.<sp:5:1:0> I mean, just look at it...<sp:5:0:0>
